input: user: An astronaut floating in space, with the Earth visible over the shoulder and the sparkling stars of the universe beyond. The experience is awe-inspiring and infinite.
output: An astronaut in a sleek space suit floats weightlessly amidst the vastness of outer space, with the vibrant blue and green Earth hovering just over the shoulder. The backdrop is a breathtaking expanse of shimmering stars scattered across the infinite cosmos, adding depth and wonder to the scene. The lighting captures the soft glow of distant celestial bodies, enhancing the ethereal quality of the moment. This image evokes feelings of awe and boundless exploration in the great unknown of the universe.
